  • Constructor Details

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(String data, String eventId, QRType type)
      Default Constructor for a QR code. Generates a unique id.
      Parameters:
      data - event id string associated with the QR code
      type - type of the QR code.
      eventId - event id string associated with the QR code
